title: Near Set Tobin Lithographs H891 4 Sale
author: Archive

posts.post_title: Near Set Tobin Lithographs H891 4 Sale
posts.post_content:
Posted By: Bruce Kasarda
Up for sale as a lot are seven of the 10 cards in the set designated H891.Great way to pick up five 19th century Hall of Famers at a decent price. Priced to sell at $$$$3500. This is the colored set. Scans available at nkasarda@cs.com. Thanks Bruce Kasarda 

Brouthers    SGC 40
Kelly        SGC 20
Anson        SGC 20
Welch        SGC 20
Keefe        SGC 10
Glasscock    SGC 40
Ferguson     SGC 20
